availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Michel (Caldwell County, Kentucky, petitioner.)

body.p: Webster County and Caldwell County, Kentucky, petition signer. North Carolina native. Married to Harriett Wynn Michel. Father of Nancy Michel, William W. Michel, and Freeman Michel.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, District 2, p. 174A.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, Dixon, Enumeration District 25, p. 44D.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #26078.
